alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 10:39PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Dodge, central Telfair and southern Wilcox Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1038 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Pitts to Abbeville to near Milan, and moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Rochelle, Milan, Rhine, Pitts, Temperance, Browning, Double Run, Antioch Church, Owensboro and Workmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
